thread.title: Iain Mackenzie
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Iain Mackenzie

author: Iain Mackenzie
title: Iain Mackenzie
text: The selection of goods available is really good, the reviews that accompany each item seem to me to be honest and I think are very helpful, the prices asked are very competitive and usually (not always) the best available in the UK, and the items arrive extremely quickly. When my wetsuit arrived with a lady's hood they changed it with no quibble. I'm very impressed and as I'm a new diver I will buying the rest of the equipment that I need from this store.
